getFd().Description: Returns the file descriptor referencing the asset.

createFromFd(android.os.ParcelFileDescri.Description: Creates an Asset using a file descriptor. The FD should be closed after being successfully sent in a putDataItem request.

createFromBytes(byte[]).Description: Creates an Asset using a byte array.

createFromRef(java.lang.String).Description: Create an Asset using an existing Asset's digest.

writeToParcel(android.os.Parcel, int).FullName: public void writeToParcel (Parcel dest, int flags)

getUri().Description: Returns the uri referencing the asset data.

createFromUri(android.net.Uri).Description: Creates an Asset using a content URI. Google Play services must have permission to read this Uri.

Returns: the Asset's digest, or null if the digest is unset
getDigest().Description: Returns the digest associated with the asset data. A digest is a content identifier used to identify the asset across devices.

ClassDesc: An asset is a binary blob shared between data items that is replicated across the wearable network on demand. It may represent an asset not yet added with the Android Wear network. @B_com#google#android#gms#wearable#DataItemAsset_E@s are representations of an asset after it has been added to the network through a @B_com#google#android#gms#wearable#PutDataRequest_E@.
